title: SOLD: 1882 NY Clipper Woodcut - Charles "Old Hoss" Radbourn HOF (BGS Auth)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1882 NY Clipper Woodcut - Charles "Old Hoss" Radbourn HOF (BGS Auth)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely rare 1882 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing HOF'er, Charles "Old Hoss" Radbourn and having been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
